name: Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de

quotes.show: Inou-Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
quotes.quote: No matter how much this world may change, I shall always remain myself.

quotes.show: Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
quotes.quote: Where will we be in five or ten years from now? No one knows. All we know right now, all we can see right now, is what's right in front of us. That's why we'll always live our 'right now' to the fullest!

quotes.show: Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
quotes.quote: Even if you're trying to protect someone, you must never use your power to hurt others.

quotes.show: Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
quotes.quote: Listen up, Cookie. Summer break is a break. We forget about homework. That's common sense. Understand?

quotes.show: Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
quotes.quote: It's my belief that powers aren't meant to hurt people. Nor are they meant to make others happy.

quotes.show: Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de
quotes.quote: Anyone can cheer for you and your dreams, but only the people closest to you can worry about you.
